2312 
2313 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2314 /* Load a sector and check if it is an FAT boot sector */
2315 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2316 
2317 MEMSPACE
2318 static
2319 BYTE check_fs ( /* 0:FAT boor sector, 1:Valid boor sector but not FAT, 2:Not a boot sector, 3:Disk error */
2320 FATFS* fs, /* File system object */
2321 DWORD sect /* Sector# (lba) to check if it is an FAT boot record or not */
2322 )
2323 {
2324  fs->wflag = 0; fs->winsect = 0xFFFFFFFF; /* Invaidate window */
2325  if (move_window(fs, sect) != FR_OK) /* Load boot record */
2326  return 3;
2327 
2328  if (LD_WORD(&fs->win[BS_55AA]) != 0xAA55) /* Check boot record signature (always placed at offset 510 even if the sector size is >512) */
2329  return 2;
2330 
2331 /* Check "FAT" string */
2332  if ((LD_DWORD(&fs->win[BS_FilSysType]) & 0xFFFFFF) == 0x544146)
2333  return 0;
2334 /* Check "FAT" string */
2335  if ((LD_DWORD(&fs->win[BS_FilSysType32]) & 0xFFFFFF) == 0x544146)
2336  return 0;
2337 
2338  return 1;
2339 }
2340 
2341 
2342 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2343 /* Find logical drive and check if the volume is mounted */
2344 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2345 
2346 MEMSPACE
2347 static
2348 FRESULT find_volume ( /* FR_OK(0): successful, !=0: any error occurred */
2349 FATFS** rfs, /* Pointer to pointer to the found file system object */
2350 const TCHAR** path, /* Pointer to pointer to the path name (drive number) */
2351 BYTE wmode /* !=0: Check write protection for write access */
2352 )
2353 {
2354  BYTE fmt;
2355  int vol;
2356  DSTATUS stat;
2357  DWORD bsect, fasize, tsect, sysect, nclst, szbfat;
2358  WORD nrsv;
2359  FATFS *fs;
2360 
2361 /* Get logical drive number from the path name */
2362  *rfs = 0;
2363  vol = get_ldnumber(path);
2364  if (vol < 0) return FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
2365 
2366 /* Check if the file system object is valid or not */
2367  fs = FatFs[vol]; /* Get pointer to the file system object */
2368  if (!fs) return FR_NOT_ENABLED; /* Is the file system object available? */
2369 
2370  ENTER_FF(fs); /* Lock the volume */
2371  *rfs = fs; /* Return pointer to the file system object */
2372 
2373  if (fs->fs_type) /* If the volume has been mounted */
2374  {
2375  stat = disk_status(fs->drv);
2376  if (!(stat & STA_NOINIT)) /* and the physical drive is kept initialized */
2377  {
2378 /* Check write protection if needed */
2379  if (!_FS_READONLY && wmode && (stat & STA_PROTECT))
2380  return FR_WRITE_PROTECTED;
2381  return FR_OK; /* The file system object is valid */
2382  }
2383  }
2384 
2385 /* The file system object is not valid. */
2386 /* Following code attempts to mount the volume. (analyze BPB and initialize the fs object) */
2387 
2388  fs->fs_type = 0; /* Clear the file system object */
2389  fs->drv = LD2PD(vol); /* Bind the logical drive and a physical drive */
2390  stat = disk_initialize(fs->drv); /* Initialize the physical drive */
2391  if (stat & STA_NOINIT) /* Check if the initialization succeeded */
2392  return FR_NOT_READY; /* Failed to initialize due to no medium or hard error */
2393 /* Check disk write protection if needed */
2394  if (!_FS_READONLY && wmode && (stat & STA_PROTECT))
2395  return FR_WRITE_PROTECTED;
2396 #if _MAX_SS != _MIN_SS /* Get sector size (multiple sector size cfg only) */
2397  if (disk_ioctl(fs->drv, GET_SECTOR_SIZE, &SS(fs)) != RES_OK
2398  || SS(fs) < _MIN_SS || SS(fs) > _MAX_SS) return FR_DISK_ERR;
2399 #endif
2400 /* Find an FAT partition on the drive. Supports only generic partitioning, FDISK and SFD. */
2401  bsect = 0;
2402  fmt = check_fs(fs, bsect); /* Load sector 0 and check if it is an FAT boot sector as SFD */
2403  if (fmt == 1 || (!fmt && (LD2PT(vol)))) /* Not an FAT boot sector or forced partition number */
2404  {
2405  UINT i;
2406  DWORD br[4];
2407 
2408  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) /* Get partition offset */
2409  {
2410  BYTE *pt = fs->win+MBR_Table + i * SZ_PTE;
2411  br[i] = pt[4] ? LD_DWORD(&pt[8]) : 0;
2412  }
2413  i = LD2PT(vol); /* Partition number: 0:auto, 1-4:forced */
2414  if (i) i--;
2415  do /* Find an FAT volume */
2416  {
2417  bsect = br[i];
2418  fmt = bsect ? check_fs(fs, bsect) : 2;/* Check the partition */
2419  } while (!LD2PT(vol) && fmt && ++i < 4);
2420  }
2421  if (fmt == 3) return FR_DISK_ERR; /* An error occured in the disk I/O layer */
2422  if (fmt) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM; /* No FAT volume is found */
2423 
2424 /* An FAT volume is found. Following code initializes the file system object */
2425 
2426  if (LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_BytsPerSec) != SS(fs))/* (BPB_BytsPerSec must be equal to the physical sector size) */
2427  return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2428 
2429  fasize = LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_FATSz16); /* Number of sectors per FAT */
2430  if (!fasize) fasize = LD_DWORD(fs->win+BPB_FATSz32);
2431  fs->fsize = fasize;
2432 
2433  fs->n_fats = fs->win[BPB_NumFATs]; /* Number of FAT copies */
2434  if (fs->n_fats != 1 && fs->n_fats != 2) /* (Must be 1 or 2) */
2435  return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2436  fasize *= fs->n_fats; /* Number of sectors for FAT area */
2437 
2438  fs->csize = fs->win[BPB_SecPerClus]; /* Number of sectors per cluster */
2439 /* (Must be power of 2) */
2440  if (!fs->csize || (fs->csize & (fs->csize - 1)))
2441  return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2442 
2443 /* Number of root directory entries */
2444  fs->n_rootdir = LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_RootEntCnt);
2445  if (fs->n_rootdir % (SS(fs) / SZ_DIR)) /* (Must be sector aligned) */
2446  return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2447 
2448  tsect = LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_TotSec16); /* Number of sectors on the volume */
2449  if (!tsect) tsect = LD_DWORD(fs->win+BPB_TotSec32);
2450 
2451  nrsv = LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_RsvdSecCnt); /* Number of reserved sectors */
2452  if (!nrsv) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM; /* (Must not be 0) */
2453 
2454 /* Determine the FAT sub type */
2455 /* RSV+FAT+DIR */
2456  sysect = nrsv + fasize + fs->n_rootdir / (SS(fs) / SZ_DIR);
2457  if (tsect < sysect) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM; /* (Invalid volume size) */
2458  nclst = (tsect - sysect) / fs->csize; /* Number of clusters */
2459  if (!nclst) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM; /* (Invalid volume size) */
2460  fmt = FS_FAT12;
2461  if (nclst >= MIN_FAT16) fmt = FS_FAT16;
2462  if (nclst >= MIN_FAT32) fmt = FS_FAT32;
2463 
2464 /* Boundaries and Limits */
2465  fs->n_fatent = nclst + 2; /* Number of FAT entries */
2466  fs->volbase = bsect; /* Volume start sector */
2467  fs->fatbase = bsect + nrsv; /* FAT start sector */
2468  fs->database = bsect + sysect; /* Data start sector */
2469  if (fmt == FS_FAT32)
2470  {
2471 /* (BPB_RootEntCnt must be 0) */
2472  if (fs->n_rootdir) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2473 /* Root directory start cluster */
2474  fs->dirbase = LD_DWORD(fs->win+BPB_RootClus);
2475  szbfat = fs->n_fatent * 4; /* (Needed FAT size) */
2476  }
2477  else
2478  {
2479 /* (BPB_RootEntCnt must not be 0) */
2480  if (!fs->n_rootdir) return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2481  fs->dirbase = fs->fatbase + fasize; /* Root directory start sector */
2482  szbfat = (fmt == FS_FAT16) ? /* (Needed FAT size) */
2483  fs->n_fatent * 2 : fs->n_fatent * 3 / 2 + (fs->n_fatent & 1);
2484  }
2485 /* (BPB_FATSz must not be less than needed) */
2486  if (fs->fsize < (szbfat + (SS(fs) - 1)) / SS(fs))
2487  return FR_NO_FILESYSTEM;
2488 
2489 #if !_FS_READONLY
2490 /* Initialize cluster allocation information */
2491  fs->last_clust = fs->free_clust = 0xFFFFFFFF;
2492 
2493 /* Get fsinfo if available */
2494  fs->fsi_flag = 0x80;
2495 #if (_FS_NOFSINFO & 3) != 3
2496  if (fmt == FS_FAT32 /* Enable FSINFO only if FAT32 and BPB_FSInfo is 1 */
2497  && LD_WORD(fs->win+BPB_FSInfo) == 1
2498  && move_window(fs, bsect + 1) == FR_OK)
2499  {
2500  fs->fsi_flag = 0;
2501  if (LD_WORD(fs->win+BS_55AA) == 0xAA55 /* Load FSINFO data if available */
2502  && LD_DWORD(fs->win+FSI_LeadSig) == 0x41615252
2503  && LD_DWORD(fs->win+FSI_StrucSig) == 0x61417272)
2504  {
2505 #if (_FS_NOFSINFO & 1) == 0
2506  fs->free_clust = LD_DWORD(fs->win+FSI_Free_Count);
2507 #endif
2508 #if (_FS_NOFSINFO & 2) == 0
2509  fs->last_clust = LD_DWORD(fs->win+FSI_Nxt_Free);
2510 #endif
2511  }
2512  }
2513 #endif
2514 #endif
2515  fs->fs_type = fmt; /* FAT sub-type */
2516  fs->id = ++Fsid; /* File system mount ID */
2517 #if _FS_RPATH
2518  fs->cdir = 0; /* Set current directory to root */
2519 #endif
2520 #if _FS_LOCK /* Clear file lock semaphores */
2521  clear_lock(fs);
2522 #endif
2523 
2524  return FR_OK;
2525 }
2526 
2527 
2528 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2529 /* Check if the file/directory object is valid or not */
2530 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2531 
2532 MEMSPACE
2533 static
2534 FRESULT validate ( /* FR_OK(0): The object is valid, !=0: Invalid */
2535 void* obj /* Pointer to the object FIL/DIR to check validity */
2536 )
2537 {
2538  FIL *fil = (FIL*)obj; /* Assuming offset of .fs and .id in the FIL/DIR structure is identical */
2539 
2540  if (!fil || !fil->fs || !fil->fs->fs_type || fil->fs->id != fil->id)
2541  return FR_INVALID_OBJECT;
2542 
2543  ENTER_FF(fil->fs); /* Lock file system */
2544 
2545  if (disk_status(fil->fs->drv) & STA_NOINIT)
2546  return FR_NOT_READY;
2547 
2548  return FR_OK;
2549 }
2550 
2551 
2552 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2553 
2554  Public Functions
2555 
2556 --------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2557 
2558 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2559 /* Mount/Unmount a Logical Drive */
2560 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2561 
2562 MEMSPACE
2563 FRESULT f_mount (
2564 FATFS* fs, /* Pointer to the file system object (NULL:unmount)*/
2565 const TCHAR* path, /* Logical drive number to be mounted/unmounted */
2566 BYTE opt /* 0:Do not mount (delayed mount), 1:Mount immediately */
2567 )
2568 {
2569  FATFS *cfs;
2570  int vol;
2571  FRESULT res;
2572  const TCHAR *rp = path;
2573 
2574  vol = get_ldnumber(&rp);
2575  if (vol < 0) return FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
2576  cfs = FatFs[vol]; /* Pointer to fs object */
2577 
2578  if (cfs)
2579  {
2580 #if _FS_LOCK
2581  clear_lock(cfs);
2582 #endif
2583 #if _FS_REENTRANT /* Discard sync object of the current volume */
2584  if (!ff_del_syncobj(cfs->sobj)) return FR_INT_ERR;
2585 #endif
2586  cfs->fs_type = 0; /* Clear old fs object */
2587  }
2588 
2589  if (fs)
2590  {
2591  fs->fs_type = 0; /* Clear new fs object */
2592 #if _FS_REENTRANT /* Create sync object for the new volume */
2593  if (!ff_cre_syncobj((BYTE)vol, &fs->sobj)) return FR_INT_ERR;
2594 #endif
2595  }
2596  FatFs[vol] = fs; /* Register new fs object */
2597 
2598  if (!fs || opt != 1) return FR_OK; /* Do not mount now, it will be mounted later */
2599 
2600  res = find_volume(&fs, &path, 0); /* Force mounted the volume */
2601  LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
2602 }
2603 
2604 
2605 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2606 /* Open or Create a File */
2607 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2608 
2609 MEMSPACE
2610 FRESULT f_open (
2611 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the blank file object */
2612 const TCHAR* path, /* Pointer to the file name */
2613 BYTE mode /* Access mode and file open mode flags */
2614 )
2615 {
2616  FRESULT res;
2617  DIR dj;
2618  BYTE *dir;
2619  DEF_NAMEBUF;
2620 
2621  if (!fp) return FR_INVALID_OBJECT;
2622  fp->fs = 0; /* Clear file object */
2623 
2624 /* Get logical drive number */
2625 #if !_FS_READONLY
2626  mode &= FA_READ | FA_WRITE | FA_CREATE_ALWAYS | FA_OPEN_ALWAYS | FA_CREATE_NEW;
2627  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, (BYTE)(mode & ~FA_READ));
2628 #else
2629  mode &= FA_READ;
2630  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 0);
2631 #endif
2632  if (res == FR_OK)
2633  {
2634  INIT_BUF(dj);
2635  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
2636  dir = dj.dir;
2637 #if !_FS_READONLY /* R/W configuration */
2638  if (res == FR_OK)
2639  {
2640  if (!dir) /* Default directory itself */
2641  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
2642 #if _FS_LOCK
2643  else
2644  res = chk_lock(&dj, (mode & ~FA_READ) ? 1 : 0);
2645 #endif
2646  }
2647 /* Create or Open a file */
2648  if (mode & (FA_CREATE_ALWAYS | FA_OPEN_ALWAYS | FA_CREATE_NEW))
2649  {
2650  DWORD dw, cl;
2651 
2652  if (res != FR_OK) /* No file, create new */
2653  {
2654  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) /* There is no file to open, create a new entry */
2655 #if _FS_LOCK
2656  res = enq_lock() ? dir_register(&dj) : FR_TOO_MANY_OPEN_FILES;
2657 #else
2658  res = dir_register(&dj);
2659 #endif
2660  mode |= FA_CREATE_ALWAYS; /* File is created */
2661  dir = dj.dir; /* New entry */
2662  }
2663  else /* Any object is already existing */
2664  {
2665 /* Cannot overwrite it (R/O or DIR) */
2666  if (dir[DIR_Attr] & (AM_RDO | AM_DIR))
2667  {
2668  res = FR_DENIED;
2669  }
2670  else
2671  {
2672  if (mode & FA_CREATE_NEW) /* Cannot create as new file */
2673  res = FR_EXIST;
2674  }
2675  }
2676 /* Truncate it if overwrite mode */
2677  if (res == FR_OK && (mode & FA_CREATE_ALWAYS))
2678  {
2679  dw = get_fattime(); /* Created time */
2680  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_CrtTime, dw);
2681  dir[DIR_Attr] = 0; /* Reset attribute */
2682  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_FileSize, 0); /* size = 0 */
2683  cl = ld_clust(dj.fs, dir); /* Get start cluster */
2684  st_clust(dir, 0); /* cluster = 0 */
2685  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
2686  if (cl) /* Remove the cluster chain if exist */
2687  {
2688  dw = dj.fs->winsect;
2689  res = remove_chain(dj.fs, cl);
2690  if (res == FR_OK)
2691  {
2692 /* Reuse the cluster hole */
2693  dj.fs->last_clust = cl - 1;
2694  res = move_window(dj.fs, dw);
2695  }
2696  }
2697  }
2698  }
2699  else /* Open an existing file */
2700  {
2701  if (res == FR_OK) /* Follow succeeded */
2702  {
2703  if (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR) /* It is a directory */
2704  {
2705  res = FR_NO_FILE;
2706  }
2707  else
2708  {
2709 /* R/O violation */
2710  if ((mode & FA_WRITE) && (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_RDO))
2711  res = FR_DENIED;
2712  }
2713  }
2714  }
2715  if (res == FR_OK)
2716  {
2717  if (mode & FA_CREATE_ALWAYS) /* Set file change flag if created or overwritten */
2718  mode |= FA__WRITTEN;
2719  fp->dir_sect = dj.fs->winsect; /* Pointer to the directory entry */
2720  fp->dir_ptr = dir;
2721 #if _FS_LOCK
2722  fp->lockid = inc_lock(&dj, (mode & ~FA_READ) ? 1 : 0);
2723  if (!fp->lockid) res = FR_INT_ERR;
2724 #endif
2725  }
2726 
2727 #else /* R/O configuration */
2728  if (res == FR_OK) /* Follow succeeded */
2729  {
2730  dir = dj.dir;
2731  if (!dir) /* Current directory itself */
2732  {
2733  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
2734  }
2735  else
2736  {
2737  if (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR) /* It is a directory */
2738  res = FR_NO_FILE;
2739  }
2740  }
2741 #endif
2742  FREE_BUF();
2743 
2744  if (res == FR_OK)
2745  {
2746  fp->flag = mode; /* File access mode */
2747  fp->err = 0; /* Clear error flag */
2748  fp->sclust = ld_clust(dj.fs, dir); /* File start cluster */
2749 /* File size */
2750  fp->fsize = LD_DWORD(dir+DIR_FileSize);
2751  fp->fptr = 0; /* File pointer */
2752  fp->dsect = 0;
2753 #if _USE_FASTSEEK
2754  fp->cltbl = 0; /* Normal seek mode */
2755 #endif
2756  fp->fs = dj.fs; /* Validate file object */
2757  fp->id = fp->fs->id;
2758  }
2759  }
2760 
2761  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
2762 }
2763 
2764 
2765 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2766 /* Read File */
2767 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2768 
2769 MEMSPACE
2770 FRESULT f_read (
2771 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
2772 void* buff, /* Pointer to data buffer */
2773 UINT btr, /* Number of bytes to read */
2774 UINT* br /* Pointer to number of bytes read */
2775 )
2776 {
2777  FRESULT res;
2778  DWORD clst, sect, remain;
2779  UINT rcnt, cc;
2780  BYTE csect, *rbuff = (BYTE*)buff;
2781 
2782  *br = 0; /* Clear read byte counter */
2783 
2784  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity */
2785  if (res != FR_OK) LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
2786  if (fp->err) /* Check error */
2787  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, (FRESULT)fp->err);
2788  if (!(fp->flag & FA_READ)) /* Check access mode */
2789  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_DENIED);
2790  remain = fp->fsize - fp->fptr;
2791  if (btr > remain) btr = (UINT)remain; /* Truncate btr by remaining bytes */
2792 
2793  for ( ; btr; /* Repeat until all data read */
2794  rbuff += rcnt, fp->fptr += rcnt, *br += rcnt, btr -= rcnt)
2795  {
2796  if ((fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)) == 0) /* On the sector boundary? */
2797  {
2798 /* Sector offset in the cluster */
2799  csect = (BYTE)(fp->fptr / SS(fp->fs) & (fp->fs->csize - 1));
2800  if (!csect) /* On the cluster boundary? */
2801  {
2802  if (fp->fptr == 0) /* On the top of the file? */
2803  {
2804  clst = fp->sclust; /* Follow from the origin */
2805  } /* Middle or end of the file */
2806  else
2807  {
2808 #if _USE_FASTSEEK
2809  if (fp->cltbl)
2810 /* Get cluster# from the CLMT */
2811  clst = clmt_clust(fp, fp->fptr);
2812  else
2813 #endif
2814 /* Follow cluster chain on the FAT */
2815  clst = get_fat(fp->fs, fp->clust);
2816  }
2817  if (clst < 2) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
2818  if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2819  fp->clust = clst; /* Update current cluster */
2820  }
2821  sect = clust2sect(fp->fs, fp->clust); /* Get current sector */
2822  if (!sect) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
2823  sect += csect;
2824  cc = btr / SS(fp->fs); /* When remaining bytes >= sector size, */
2825  if (cc) /* Read maximum contiguous sectors directly */
2826  {
2827  if (csect + cc > fp->fs->csize) /* Clip at cluster boundary */
2828  cc = fp->fs->csize - csect;
2829  if (disk_read(fp->fs->drv, rbuff, sect, cc))
2830  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2831 /* Replace one of the read sectors with cached data if it contains a dirty sector */
2832 #if !_FS_READONLY && _FS_MINIMIZE <= 2
2833 #if _FS_TINY
2834  if (fp->fs->wflag && fp->fs->winsect - sect < cc)
2835  mem_cpy(rbuff + ((fp->fs->winsect - sect) * SS(fp->fs)), fp->fs->win, SS(fp->fs));
2836 #else
2837  if ((fp->flag & FA__DIRTY) && fp->dsect - sect < cc)
2838  mem_cpy(rbuff + ((fp->dsect - sect) * SS(fp->fs)), fp->buf, SS(fp->fs));
2839 #endif
2840 #endif
2841  rcnt = SS(fp->fs) * cc; /* Number of bytes transferred */
2842  continue;
2843  }
2844 #if !_FS_TINY
2845  if (fp->dsect != sect) /* Load data sector if not in cache */
2846  {
2847 #if !_FS_READONLY
2848  if (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY) /* Write-back dirty sector cache */
2849  {
2850  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
2851  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2852  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
2853  }
2854 #endif
2855 /* Fill sector cache */
2856  if (disk_read(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, sect, 1))
2857  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2858  }
2859 #endif
2860  fp->dsect = sect;
2861  }
2862 /* Get partial sector data from sector buffer */
2863  rcnt = SS(fp->fs) - ((UINT)fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs));
2864  if (rcnt > btr) rcnt = btr;
2865 #if _FS_TINY
2866  if (move_window(fp->fs, fp->dsect)) /* Move sector window */
2867  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2868 /* Pick partial sector */
2869  mem_cpy(rbuff, &fp->fs->win[fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)], rcnt);
2870 #else
2871 /* Pick partial sector */
2872  mem_cpy(rbuff, &fp->buf[fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)], rcnt);
2873 #endif
2874  }
2875 
2876  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_OK);
2877 }
2878 
2879 
2880 #if !_FS_READONLY
2881 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2882 /* Write File */
2883 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2884 
2885 MEMSPACE
2886 FRESULT f_write (
2887 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
2888 const void *buff, /* Pointer to the data to be written */
2889 UINT btw, /* Number of bytes to write */
2890 UINT* bw /* Pointer to number of bytes written */
2891 )
2892 {
2893  FRESULT res;
2894  DWORD clst, sect;
2895  UINT wcnt, cc;
2896  const BYTE *wbuff = (const BYTE*)buff;
2897  BYTE csect;
2898 
2899  *bw = 0; /* Clear write byte counter */
2900 
2901  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity */
2902  if (res != FR_OK) LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
2903  if (fp->err) /* Check error */
2904  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, (FRESULT)fp->err);
2905  if (!(fp->flag & FA_WRITE)) /* Check access mode */
2906  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_DENIED);
2907  if (fp->fptr + btw < fp->fptr) btw = 0; /* File size cannot reach 4GB */
2908 
2909  for ( ; btw; /* Repeat until all data written */
2910  wbuff += wcnt, fp->fptr += wcnt, *bw += wcnt, btw -= wcnt)
2911  {
2912  if ((fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)) == 0) /* On the sector boundary? */
2913  {
2914 /* Sector offset in the cluster */
2915  csect = (BYTE)(fp->fptr / SS(fp->fs) & (fp->fs->csize - 1));
2916  if (!csect) /* On the cluster boundary? */
2917  {
2918  if (fp->fptr == 0) /* On the top of the file? */
2919  {
2920  clst = fp->sclust; /* Follow from the origin */
2921  if (clst == 0) /* When no cluster is allocated, */
2922 /* Create a new cluster chain */
2923  clst = create_chain(fp->fs, 0);
2924  } /* Middle or end of the file */
2925  else
2926  {
2927 #if _USE_FASTSEEK
2928  if (fp->cltbl)
2929 /* Get cluster# from the CLMT */
2930  clst = clmt_clust(fp, fp->fptr);
2931  else
2932 #endif
2933 /* Follow or stretch cluster chain on the FAT */
2934  clst = create_chain(fp->fs, fp->clust);
2935  }
2936  if (clst == 0) break; /* Could not allocate a new cluster (disk full) */
2937  if (clst == 1) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
2938  if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2939  fp->clust = clst; /* Update current cluster */
2940 /* Set start cluster if the first write */
2941  if (fp->sclust == 0) fp->sclust = clst;
2942  }
2943 #if _FS_TINY
2944 /* Write-back sector cache */
2945  if (fp->fs->winsect == fp->dsect && sync_window(fp->fs))
2946  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2947 #else
2948  if (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY) /* Write-back sector cache */
2949  {
2950  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
2951  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2952  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
2953  }
2954 #endif
2955  sect = clust2sect(fp->fs, fp->clust); /* Get current sector */
2956  if (!sect) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
2957  sect += csect;
2958  cc = btw / SS(fp->fs); /* When remaining bytes >= sector size, */
2959  if (cc) /* Write maximum contiguous sectors directly */
2960  {
2961  if (csect + cc > fp->fs->csize) /* Clip at cluster boundary */
2962  cc = fp->fs->csize - csect;
2963  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, wbuff, sect, cc))
2964  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2965 #if _FS_MINIMIZE <= 2
2966 #if _FS_TINY
2967  if (fp->fs->winsect - sect < cc) /* Refill sector cache if it gets invalidated by the direct write */
2968  {
2969  mem_cpy(fp->fs->win, wbuff + ((fp->fs->winsect - sect) * SS(fp->fs)), SS(fp->fs));
2970  fp->fs->wflag = 0;
2971  }
2972 #else
2973  if (fp->dsect - sect < cc) /* Refill sector cache if it gets invalidated by the direct write */
2974  {
2975  mem_cpy(fp->buf, wbuff + ((fp->dsect - sect) * SS(fp->fs)), SS(fp->fs));
2976  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
2977  }
2978 #endif
2979 #endif
2980  wcnt = SS(fp->fs) * cc; /* Number of bytes transferred */
2981  continue;
2982  }
2983 #if _FS_TINY
2984  if (fp->fptr >= fp->fsize) /* Avoid silly cache filling at growing edge */
2985  {
2986  if (sync_window(fp->fs)) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2987  fp->fs->winsect = sect;
2988  }
2989 #else
2990  if (fp->dsect != sect) /* Fill sector cache with file data */
2991  {
2992  if (fp->fptr < fp->fsize &&
2993  disk_read(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, sect, 1))
2994  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
2995  }
2996 #endif
2997  fp->dsect = sect;
2998  }
2999 /* Put partial sector into file I/O buffer */
3000  wcnt = SS(fp->fs) - ((UINT)fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs));
3001  if (wcnt > btw) wcnt = btw;
3002 #if _FS_TINY
3003  if (move_window(fp->fs, fp->dsect)) /* Move sector window */
3004  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3005 /* Fit partial sector */
3006  mem_cpy(&fp->fs->win[fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)], wbuff, wcnt);
3007  fp->fs->wflag = 1;
3008 #else
3009 /* Fit partial sector */
3010  mem_cpy(&fp->buf[fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)], wbuff, wcnt);
3011  fp->flag |= FA__DIRTY;
3012 #endif
3013  }
3014 
3015 /* Update file size if needed */
3016  if (fp->fptr > fp->fsize) fp->fsize = fp->fptr;
3017  fp->flag |= FA__WRITTEN; /* Set file change flag */
3018 
3019  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_OK);
3020 }
3021 
3022 
3023 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3024 /* Synchronize the File */
3025 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3026 
3027 MEMSPACE
3028 FRESULT f_sync (
3029 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
3030 )
3031 {
3032  FRESULT res;
3033  DWORD tm;
3034  BYTE *dir;
3035 
3036  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity of the object */
3037  if (res == FR_OK)
3038  {
3039  if (fp->flag & FA__WRITTEN) /* Has the file been written? */
3040  {
3041 /* Write-back dirty buffer */
3042 #if !_FS_TINY
3043  if (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY)
3044  {
3045  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
3046  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3047  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
3048  }
3049 #endif
3050 /* Update the directory entry */
3051  res = move_window(fp->fs, fp->dir_sect);
3052  if (res == FR_OK)
3053  {
3054  dir = fp->dir_ptr;
3055  dir[DIR_Attr] |= AM_ARC; /* Set archive bit */
3056 /* Update file size */
3057  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_FileSize, fp->fsize);
3058  st_clust(dir, fp->sclust); /* Update start cluster */
3059  tm = get_fattime(); /* Update updated time */
3060  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_WrtTime, tm);
3061  ST_WORD(dir+DIR_LstAccDate, 0);
3062  fp->flag &= ~FA__WRITTEN;
3063  fp->fs->wflag = 1;
3064  res = sync_fs(fp->fs);
3065  }
3066  }
3067  }
3068 
3069  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
3070 }
3071 #endif /* !_FS_READONLY */
3072 
3073 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3074 /* Close File */
3075 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3076 
3077 MEMSPACE
3078 FRESULT f_close (
3079 FIL *fp /* Pointer to the file object to be closed */
3080 )
3081 {
3082  FRESULT res;
3083 
3084 #if !_FS_READONLY
3085  res = f_sync(fp); /* Flush cached data */
3086  if (res == FR_OK)
3087 #endif
3088  {
3089  res = validate(fp); /* Lock volume */
3090  if (res == FR_OK)
3091  {
3092 #if _FS_REENTRANT
3093  FATFS *fs = fp->fs;
3094 #endif
3095 #if _FS_LOCK
3096  res = dec_lock(fp->lockid); /* Decrement file open counter */
3097  if (res == FR_OK)
3098 #endif
3099  fp->fs = 0; /* Invalidate file object */
3100 #if _FS_REENTRANT
3101  unlock_fs(fs, FR_OK); /* Unlock volume */
3102 #endif
3103  }
3104  }
3105  return res;
3106 }

3113 #if _FS_RPATH >= 1
3114 #if _VOLUMES >= 2
3115 MEMSPACE
3116 FRESULT f_chdrive (
3117 const TCHAR* path /* Drive number */
3118 )
3119 {
3120  int vol;
3121 
3122  vol = get_ldnumber(&path);
3123  if (vol < 0) return FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
3124 
3125  CurrVol = (BYTE)vol;
3126 
3127  return FR_OK;

3129 #endif

3131 MEMSPACE
3132 FRESULT f_chdir (
3133 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the directory path */
3134 )
3135 {
3136  FRESULT res;
3137  DIR dj;
3138  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3139 
3140 /* Get logical drive number */
3141  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 0);
3142  if (res == FR_OK)
3143  {
3144  INIT_BUF(dj);
3145  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the path */
3146  FREE_BUF();
3147  if (res == FR_OK) /* Follow completed */
3148  {
3149  if (!dj.dir)
3150  {
3151  dj.fs->cdir = dj.sclust; /* Start directory itself */
3152  }
3153  else
3154  {
3155  if (dj.dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR) /* Reached to the directory */
3156  dj.fs->cdir = ld_clust(dj.fs, dj.dir);
3157  else
3158  res = FR_NO_PATH; /* Reached but a file */
3159  }
3160  }
3161  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) res = FR_NO_PATH;
3162  }
3163 
3164  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
3165 }

3167 
3168 #if _FS_RPATH >= 2
3169 MEMSPACE
3170 FRESULT f_getcwd (
3171 TCHAR* buff, /* Pointer to the directory path */
3172 UINT len /* Size of path */
3173 )
3174 {
3175  FRESULT res;
3176  DIR dj;
3177  UINT i, n;
3178  DWORD ccl;
3179  TCHAR *tp;
3180  FILINFO fno;
3181  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3182 
3183  *buff = 0;
3184 /* Get logical drive number */
3185 /* Get current volume */
3186  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, (const TCHAR**)&buff, 0);
3187  if (res == FR_OK)
3188  {
3189  INIT_BUF(dj);
3190  i = len; /* Bottom of buffer (directory stack base) */
3191  dj.sclust = dj.fs->cdir; /* Start to follow upper directory from current directory */
3192  while ((ccl = dj.sclust) != 0) /* Repeat while current directory is a sub-directory */
3193  {
3194  res = dir_sdi(&dj, 1); /* Get parent directory */
3195  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3196  res = dir_read(&dj, 0);
3197  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3198  dj.sclust = ld_clust(dj.fs, dj.dir); /* Goto parent directory */
3199  res = dir_sdi(&dj, 0);
3200  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3201  do /* Find the entry links to the child directory */
3202  {
3203  res = dir_read(&dj, 0);
3204  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3205 /* Found the entry */
3206  if (ccl == ld_clust(dj.fs, dj.dir)) break;
3207  res = dir_next(&dj, 0);
3208  } while (res == FR_OK);
3209 /* It cannot be 'not found'. */
3210  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) res = FR_INT_ERR;
3211  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3212 #if _USE_LFN
3213  fno.lfname = buff;
3214  fno.lfsize = i;
3215 #endif
3216  get_fileinfo(&dj, &fno); /* Get the directory name and push it to the buffer */
3217  tp = fno.fname;
3218 #if _USE_LFN
3219  if (*buff) tp = buff;
3220 #endif
3221  for (n = 0; tp[n]; n++) ;
3222  if (i < n + 3)
3223  {
3224  res = FR_NOT_ENOUGH_CORE; break;
3225  }
3226  while (n) buff[--i] = tp[--n];
3227  buff[--i] = '/';
3228  }
3229  tp = buff;
3230  if (res == FR_OK)
3231  {
3232 #if _VOLUMES >= 2
3233  *tp++ = '0' + CurrVol; /* Put drive number */
3234  *tp++ = ':';
3235 #endif
3236  if (i == len) /* Root-directory */
3237  {
3238  *tp++ = '/';
3239  } /* Sub-directroy */
3240  else
3241  {
3242  do /* Add stacked path str */
3243  *tp++ = buff[i++];
3244  while (i < len);
3245  }
3246  }
3247  *tp = 0;
3248  FREE_BUF();
3249  }
3250 
3251  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
3252 }
3253 #endif /* _FS_RPATH >= 2 */
3254 #endif /* _FS_RPATH >= 1 */
3255 
3256 #if _FS_MINIMIZE <= 2
3257 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3258 /* Seek File R/W Pointer */
3259 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3260 
3261 MEMSPACE
3262 FRESULT f_lseek (
3263 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
3264 DWORD ofs /* File pointer from top of file */
3265 )
3266 {
3267  FRESULT res;
3268 
3269  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity of the object */
3270  if (res != FR_OK) LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
3271  if (fp->err) /* Check error */
3272  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, (FRESULT)fp->err);
3273 
3274 #if _USE_FASTSEEK
3275  if (fp->cltbl) /* Fast seek */
3276  {
3277  DWORD cl, pcl, ncl, tcl, dsc, tlen, ulen, *tbl;
3278 
3279  if (ofs == CREATE_LINKMAP) /* Create CLMT */
3280  {
3281  tbl = fp->cltbl;
3282  tlen = *tbl++; ulen = 2; /* Given table size and required table size */
3283  cl = fp->sclust; /* Top of the chain */
3284  if (cl)
3285  {
3286  do
3287  {
3288 /* Get a fragment */
3289  tcl = cl; ncl = 0; ulen += 2; /* Top, length and used items */
3290  do
3291  {
3292  pcl = cl; ncl++;
3293  cl = get_fat(fp->fs, cl);
3294  if (cl <= 1) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
3295  if (cl == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3296  } while (cl == pcl + 1);
3297  if (ulen <= tlen) /* Store the length and top of the fragment */
3298  {
3299  *tbl++ = ncl; *tbl++ = tcl;
3300  }
3301 /* Repeat until end of chain */
3302  } while (cl < fp->fs->n_fatent);
3303  }
3304  *fp->cltbl = ulen; /* Number of items used */
3305  if (ulen <= tlen)
3306  *tbl = 0; /* Terminate table */
3307  else
3308  res = FR_NOT_ENOUGH_CORE; /* Given table size is smaller than required */
3309 
3310  } /* Fast seek */
3311  else
3312  {
3313  if (ofs > fp->fsize) /* Clip offset at the file size */
3314  ofs = fp->fsize;
3315  fp->fptr = ofs; /* Set file pointer */
3316  if (ofs)
3317  {
3318  fp->clust = clmt_clust(fp, ofs - 1);
3319  dsc = clust2sect(fp->fs, fp->clust);
3320  if (!dsc) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
3321  dsc += (ofs - 1) / SS(fp->fs) & (fp->fs->csize - 1);
3322 /* Refill sector cache if needed */
3323  if (fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs) && dsc != fp->dsect)
3324  {
3325 #if !_FS_TINY
3326 #if !_FS_READONLY
3327  if (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY) /* Write-back dirty sector cache */
3328  {
3329  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
3330  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3331  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
3332  }
3333 #endif
3334 /* Load current sector */
3335  if (disk_read(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, dsc, 1))
3336  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3337 #endif
3338  fp->dsect = dsc;
3339  }
3340  }
3341  }
3342  } else
3343 #endif
3344 
3345 /* Normal Seek */
3346  {
3347  DWORD clst, bcs, nsect, ifptr;
3348 
3349  if (ofs > fp->fsize /* In read-only mode, clip offset with the file size */
3350  #if !_FS_READONLY
3351  && !(fp->flag & FA_WRITE)
3352  #endif
3353  ) ofs = fp->fsize;
3354 
3355  ifptr = fp->fptr;
3356  fp->fptr = nsect = 0;
3357  if (ofs)
3358  {
3359 /* Cluster size (byte) */
3360  bcs = (DWORD)fp->fs->csize * SS(fp->fs);
3361  if (ifptr > 0 &&
3362 /* When seek to same or following cluster, */
3363  (ofs - 1) / bcs >= (ifptr - 1) / bcs)
3364  {
3365 /* start from the current cluster */
3366  fp->fptr = (ifptr - 1) & ~(bcs - 1);
3367  ofs -= fp->fptr;
3368  clst = fp->clust;
3369  } /* When seek to back cluster, */
3370  else
3371  {
3372  clst = fp->sclust; /* start from the first cluster */
3373 #if !_FS_READONLY
3374  if (clst == 0) /* If no cluster chain, create a new chain */
3375  {
3376  clst = create_chain(fp->fs, 0);
3377  if (clst == 1) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
3378  if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3379  fp->sclust = clst;
3380  }
3381 #endif
3382  fp->clust = clst;
3383  }
3384  if (clst != 0)
3385  {
3386  while (ofs > bcs) /* Cluster following loop */
3387  {
3388 #if !_FS_READONLY
3389  if (fp->flag & FA_WRITE) /* Check if in write mode or not */
3390  {
3391 /* Force stretch if in write mode */
3392  clst = create_chain(fp->fs, clst);
3393  if (clst == 0) /* When disk gets full, clip file size */
3394  {
3395  ofs = bcs; break;
3396  }
3397  } else
3398 #endif
3399  clst = get_fat(fp->fs, clst); /* Follow cluster chain if not in write mode */
3400  if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3401  if (clst <= 1 || clst >= fp->fs->n_fatent) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
3402  fp->clust = clst;
3403  fp->fptr += bcs;
3404  ofs -= bcs;
3405  }
3406  fp->fptr += ofs;
3407  if (ofs % SS(fp->fs))
3408  {
3409 /* Current sector */
3410  nsect = clust2sect(fp->fs, clst);
3411  if (!nsect) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
3412  nsect += ofs / SS(fp->fs);
3413  }
3414  }
3415  }
3416 /* Fill sector cache if needed */
3417  if (fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs) && nsect != fp->dsect)
3418  {
3419 #if !_FS_TINY
3420 #if !_FS_READONLY
3421  if (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY) /* Write-back dirty sector cache */
3422  {
3423  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
3424  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3425  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
3426  }
3427 #endif
3428 /* Fill sector cache */
3429  if (disk_read(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, nsect, 1))
3430  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
3431 #endif
3432  fp->dsect = nsect;
3433  }
3434 #if !_FS_READONLY
3435  if (fp->fptr > fp->fsize) /* Set file change flag if the file size is extended */
3436  {
3437  fp->fsize = fp->fptr;
3438  fp->flag |= FA__WRITTEN;
3439  }
3440 #endif
3441  }
3442 
3443  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
3444 }
3445 
3446 
3447 #if _FS_MINIMIZE <= 1
3448 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3449 /* Create a Directory Object */
3450 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3451 
3452 MEMSPACE
3453 FRESULT f_opendir (
3454 DIR* dp, /* Pointer to directory object to create */
3455 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the directory path */
3456 )
3457 {
3458  FRESULT res;
3459  FATFS* fs;
3460  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3461 
3462  if (!dp) return FR_INVALID_OBJECT;
3463 
3464 /* Get logical drive number */
3465  res = find_volume(&fs, &path, 0);
3466  if (res == FR_OK)
3467  {
3468  dp->fs = fs;
3469  INIT_BUF(*dp);
3470  res = follow_path(dp, path); /* Follow the path to the directory */
3471  FREE_BUF();
3472  if (res == FR_OK) /* Follow completed */
3473  {
3474  if (dp->dir) /* It is not the origin directory itself */
3475  {
3476  if (dp->dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR) /* The object is a sub directory */
3477  dp->sclust = ld_clust(fs, dp->dir);
3478  else /* The object is a file */
3479  res = FR_NO_PATH;
3480  }
3481  if (res == FR_OK)
3482  {
3483  dp->id = fs->id;
3484  res = dir_sdi(dp, 0); /* Rewind directory */
3485 #if _FS_LOCK
3486  if (res == FR_OK)
3487  {
3488  if (dp->sclust)
3489  {
3490 /* Lock the sub directory */
3491  dp->lockid = inc_lock(dp, 0);
3492  if (!dp->lockid)
3493  res = FR_TOO_MANY_OPEN_FILES;
3494  }
3495  else
3496  {
3497  dp->lockid = 0; /* Root directory need not to be locked */
3498  }
3499  }
3500 #endif
3501  }
3502  }
3503  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) res = FR_NO_PATH;
3504  }
3505  if (res != FR_OK) dp->fs = 0; /* Invalidate the directory object if function faild */
3506 
3507  LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
3508 }

3516 FRESULT f_closedir (
3517 DIR *dp /* Pointer to the directory object to be closed */
3518 )
3519 {
3520  FRESULT res;
3521 
3522  res = validate(dp);
3523  if (res == FR_OK)
3524  {
3525 #if _FS_REENTRANT
3526  FATFS *fs = dp->fs;
3527 #endif
3528 #if _FS_LOCK
3529  if (dp->lockid) /* Decrement sub-directory open counter */
3530  res = dec_lock(dp->lockid);
3531  if (res == FR_OK)
3532 #endif
3533  dp->fs = 0; /* Invalidate directory object */
3534 #if _FS_REENTRANT
3535  unlock_fs(fs, FR_OK); /* Unlock volume */
3536 #endif
3537  }
3538  return res;
3539 }

3541 
3542 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3543 /* Read Directory Entries in Sequence */
3544 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3545 
3546 MEMSPACE
3547 FRESULT f_readdir (
3548 DIR* dp, /* Pointer to the open directory object */
3549 FILINFO* fno /* Pointer to file information to return */
3550 )
3551 {
3552  FRESULT res;
3553  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3554 
3555  res = validate(dp); /* Check validity of the object */
3556  if (res == FR_OK)
3557  {
3558  if (!fno)
3559  {
3560  res = dir_sdi(dp, 0); /* Rewind the directory object */
3561  }
3562  else
3563  {
3564  INIT_BUF(*dp);
3565  res = dir_read(dp, 0); /* Read an item */
3566  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) /* Reached end of directory */
3567  {
3568  dp->sect = 0;
3569  res = FR_OK;
3570  }
3571  if (res == FR_OK) /* A valid entry is found */
3572  {
3573  get_fileinfo(dp, fno); /* Get the object information */
3574  res = dir_next(dp, 0); /* Increment index for next */
3575  if (res == FR_NO_FILE)
3576  {
3577  dp->sect = 0;
3578  res = FR_OK;
3579  }
3580  }
3581  FREE_BUF();
3582  }
3583  }
3584 
3585  LEAVE_FF(dp->fs, res);
3586 }
3587 
3588

3591 /* Get File Status */

3593 
3594 MEMSPACE
3595 FRESULT f_stat (
3596 const TCHAR* path, /* Pointer to the file path */
3597 FILINFO* fno /* Pointer to file information to return */
3598 )
3599 {
3600  FRESULT res;
3601  DIR dj;
3602  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3603 
3604 /* Get logical drive number */
3605  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 0);
3606  if (res == FR_OK)
3607  {
3608  INIT_BUF(dj);
3609  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
3610  if (res == FR_OK) /* Follow completed */
3611  {
3612  if (dj.dir) /* Found an object */
3613  {
3614  if (fno) get_fileinfo(&dj, fno);
3615  } /* It is root directory */
3616  else
3617  {
3618  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
3619  }
3620  }
3621  FREE_BUF();
3622  }
3623 
3624  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);

3627 
3628 #if !_FS_READONLY
3629 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3630 /* Get Number of Free Clusters */
3631 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3632 
3633 MEMSPACE
3634 FRESULT f_getfree (
3635 const TCHAR* path, /* Path name of the logical drive number */
3636 DWORD* nclst, /* Pointer to a variable to return number of free clusters */
3637 FATFS** fatfs /* Pointer to return pointer to corresponding file system object */
3638 )
3639 {
3640  FRESULT res;
3641  FATFS *fs;
3642  DWORD n, clst, sect, stat;
3643  UINT i;
3644  BYTE fat, *p;
3645 
3646 /* Get logical drive number */
3647  res = find_volume(fatfs, &path, 0);
3648  fs = *fatfs;
3649  if (res == FR_OK)
3650  {
3651 /* If free_clust is valid, return it without full cluster scan */
3652  if (fs->free_clust <= fs->n_fatent - 2)
3653  {
3654  *nclst = fs->free_clust;
3655  }
3656  else
3657  {
3658 /* Get number of free clusters */
3659  fat = fs->fs_type;
3660  n = 0;
3661  if (fat == FS_FAT12)
3662  {
3663  clst = 2;
3664  do
3665  {
3666  stat = get_fat(fs, clst);
3667  if (stat == 0xFFFFFFFF) { res = FR_DISK_ERR; break; }
3668  if (stat == 1) { res = FR_INT_ERR; break; }
3669  if (stat == 0) n++;
3670 #ifdef ESP8266
3671  wdt_reset();
3672 #endif
3673  } while (++clst < fs->n_fatent);
3674  }
3675  else
3676  {
3677  clst = fs->n_fatent;
3678  sect = fs->fatbase;
3679  i = 0; p = 0;
3680  do
3681  {
3682  if (!i)
3683  {
3684  res = move_window(fs, sect++);
3685  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3686  p = fs->win;
3687  i = SS(fs);
3688  }
3689  if (fat == FS_FAT16)
3690  {
3691  if (LD_WORD(p) == 0) n++;
3692  p += 2; i -= 2;
3693  }
3694  else
3695  {
3696  if ((LD_DWORD(p) & 0x0FFFFFFF) == 0) n++;
3697  p += 4; i -= 4;
3698  }
3699 #ifdef ESP8266
3700  wdt_reset();
3701 #endif
3702  } while (--clst);
3703  }
3704  fs->free_clust = n;
3705  fs->fsi_flag |= 1;
3706  *nclst = n;
3707  }
3708  }
3709  LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
3710 }
3711 
3712 
3713 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3714 /* Truncate File */
3715 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3716 
3717 MEMSPACE
3718 FRESULT f_truncate (
3719 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
3720 )
3721 {
3722  FRESULT res;
3723  DWORD ncl;
3724 
3725  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity of the object */
3726  if (res == FR_OK)
3727  {
3728  if (fp->err) /* Check error */
3729  {
3730  res = (FRESULT)fp->err;
3731  }
3732  else
3733  {
3734  if (!(fp->flag & FA_WRITE)) /* Check access mode */
3735  res = FR_DENIED;
3736  }
3737  }
3738  if (res == FR_OK)
3739  {
3740  if (fp->fsize > fp->fptr)
3741  {
3742  fp->fsize = fp->fptr; /* Set file size to current R/W point */
3743  fp->flag |= FA__WRITTEN;
3744  if (fp->fptr == 0) /* When set file size to zero, remove entire cluster chain */
3745  {
3746  res = remove_chain(fp->fs, fp->sclust);
3747  fp->sclust = 0;
3748  } /* When truncate a part of the file, remove remaining clusters */
3749  else
3750  {
3751  ncl = get_fat(fp->fs, fp->clust);
3752  res = FR_OK;
3753  if (ncl == 0xFFFFFFFF) res = FR_DISK_ERR;
3754  if (ncl == 1) res = FR_INT_ERR;
3755  if (res == FR_OK && ncl < fp->fs->n_fatent)
3756  {
3757  res = put_fat(fp->fs, fp->clust, 0x0FFFFFFF);
3758  if (res == FR_OK) res = remove_chain(fp->fs, ncl);
3759  }
3760  }
3761 #if !_FS_TINY
3762  if (res == FR_OK && (fp->flag & FA__DIRTY))
3763  {
3764  if (disk_write(fp->fs->drv, fp->buf, fp->dsect, 1))
3765  res = FR_DISK_ERR;
3766  else
3767  fp->flag &= ~FA__DIRTY;
3768  }
3769 #endif
3770  }
3771  if (res != FR_OK) fp->err = (FRESULT)res;
3772  }
3773 
3774  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
3775 }
3776 
3777 
3778 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3779 /* Delete a File or Directory */
3780 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3781 
3782 MEMSPACE
3783 FRESULT f_unlink (
3784 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the file or directory path */
3785 )
3786 {
3787  FRESULT res;
3788  DIR dj, sdj;
3789  BYTE *dir;
3790  DWORD dclst;
3791  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3792 
3793 /* Get logical drive number */
3794  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 1);
3795  if (res == FR_OK)
3796  {
3797  INIT_BUF(dj);
3798  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
3799  if (_FS_RPATH && res == FR_OK && (dj.fn[NS] & NS_DOT))
3800  res = FR_INVALID_NAME; /* Cannot remove dot entry */
3801 #if _FS_LOCK
3802  if (res == FR_OK) res = chk_lock(&dj, 2); /* Cannot remove open file */
3803 #endif
3804  if (res == FR_OK) /* The object is accessible */
3805  {
3806  dir = dj.dir;
3807  if (!dir)
3808  {
3809  res = FR_INVALID_NAME; /* Cannot remove the start directory */
3810  }
3811  else
3812  {
3813  if (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_RDO)
3814  res = FR_DENIED; /* Cannot remove R/O object */
3815  }
3816  dclst = ld_clust(dj.fs, dir);
3817 /* Is it a sub-dir? */
3818  if (res == FR_OK && (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR))
3819  {
3820  if (dclst < 2)
3821  {
3822  res = FR_INT_ERR;
3823  }
3824  else
3825  {
3826 /* Check if the sub-directory is empty or not */
3827  mem_cpy(&sdj, &dj, sizeof (DIR));
3828  sdj.sclust = dclst;
3829  res = dir_sdi(&sdj, 2); /* Exclude dot entries */
3830  if (res == FR_OK)
3831  {
3832  res = dir_read(&sdj, 0); /* Read an item */
3833  if (res == FR_OK /* Not empty directory */
3834  #if _FS_RPATH
3835 /* Current directory */
3836  || dclst == dj.fs->cdir
3837  #endif
3838  ) res = FR_DENIED;
3839 /* Empty */
3840  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) res = FR_OK;
3841  }
3842  }
3843  }
3844  if (res == FR_OK)
3845  {
3846  res = dir_remove(&dj); /* Remove the directory entry */
3847  if (res == FR_OK)
3848  {
3849  if (dclst) /* Remove the cluster chain if exist */
3850  res = remove_chain(dj.fs, dclst);
3851  if (res == FR_OK) res = sync_fs(dj.fs);
3852  }
3853  }
3854  }
3855  FREE_BUF();
3856  }
3857 
3858  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
3859 }
3860 
3861 
3862 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3863 /* Create a Directory */
3864 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3865 
3866 MEMSPACE
3867 FRESULT f_mkdir (
3868 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the directory path */
3869 )
3870 {
3871  FRESULT res;
3872  DIR dj;
3873  BYTE *dir, n;
3874  DWORD dsc, dcl, pcl, tm = get_fattime();
3875  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3876 
3877 /* Get logical drive number */
3878  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 1);
3879  if (res == FR_OK)
3880  {
3881  INIT_BUF(dj);
3882  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
3883  if (res == FR_OK) res = FR_EXIST; /* Any object with same name is already existing */
3884  if (_FS_RPATH && res == FR_NO_FILE && (dj.fn[NS] & NS_DOT))
3885  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
3886  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) /* Can create a new directory */
3887  {
3888  dcl = create_chain(dj.fs, 0); /* Allocate a cluster for the new directory table */
3889  res = FR_OK;
3890  if (dcl == 0) res = FR_DENIED; /* No space to allocate a new cluster */
3891  if (dcl == 1) res = FR_INT_ERR;
3892  if (dcl == 0xFFFFFFFF) res = FR_DISK_ERR;
3893  if (res == FR_OK) /* Flush FAT */
3894  res = sync_window(dj.fs);
3895  if (res == FR_OK) /* Initialize the new directory table */
3896  {
3897  dsc = clust2sect(dj.fs, dcl);
3898  dir = dj.fs->win;
3899  mem_set(dir, 0, SS(dj.fs));
3900  mem_set(dir+DIR_Name, ' ', 11); /* Create "." entry */
3901  dir[DIR_Name] = '.';
3902  dir[DIR_Attr] = AM_DIR;
3903  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_WrtTime, tm);
3904  st_clust(dir, dcl);
3905  mem_cpy(dir+SZ_DIR, dir, SZ_DIR); /* Create ".." entry */
3906  dir[SZ_DIR+1] = '.'; pcl = dj.sclust;
3907  if (dj.fs->fs_type == FS_FAT32 && pcl == dj.fs->dirbase)
3908  pcl = 0;
3909  st_clust(dir+SZ_DIR, pcl);
3910  for (n = dj.fs->csize; n; n--) /* Write dot entries and clear following sectors */
3911  {
3912  dj.fs->winsect = dsc++;
3913  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
3914  res = sync_window(dj.fs);
3915  if (res != FR_OK) break;
3916  mem_set(dir, 0, SS(dj.fs));
3917  }
3918  }
3919 /* Register the object to the directoy */
3920  if (res == FR_OK) res = dir_register(&dj);
3921  if (res != FR_OK)
3922  {
3923  remove_chain(dj.fs, dcl); /* Could not register, remove cluster chain */
3924  }
3925  else
3926  {
3927  dir = dj.dir;
3928  dir[DIR_Attr] = AM_DIR; /* Attribute */
3929  ST_DWORD(dir+DIR_WrtTime, tm); /* Created time */
3930  st_clust(dir, dcl); /* Table start cluster */
3931  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
3932  res = sync_fs(dj.fs);
3933  }
3934  }
3935  FREE_BUF();
3936  }
3937 
3938  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
3939 }

3942 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3943 /* Change Attribute */
3944 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
3945 
3946 MEMSPACE
3947 FRESULT f_chmod (
3948 const TCHAR* path, /* Pointer to the file path */
3949 BYTE value, /* Attribute bits */
3950 BYTE mask /* Attribute mask to change */
3951 )
3952 {
3953  FRESULT res;
3954  DIR dj;
3955  BYTE *dir;
3956  DEF_NAMEBUF;
3957 
3958 /* Get logical drive number */
3959  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 1);
3960  if (res == FR_OK)
3961  {
3962  INIT_BUF(dj);
3963  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
3964  FREE_BUF();
3965  if (_FS_RPATH && res == FR_OK && (dj.fn[NS] & NS_DOT))
3966  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
3967  if (res == FR_OK)
3968  {
3969  dir = dj.dir;
3970  if (!dir) /* Is it a root directory? */
3971  {
3972  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
3973  } /* File or sub directory */
3974  else
3975  {
3976 /* Valid attribute mask */
3977  mask &= AM_RDO|AM_HID|AM_SYS|AM_ARC;
3978 /* Apply attribute change */
3979  dir[DIR_Attr] = (value & mask) | (dir[DIR_Attr] & (BYTE)~mask);
3980  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
3981  res = sync_fs(dj.fs);
3982  }
3983  }
3984  }
3985 
3986  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
3987 }

3996 const TCHAR* path, /* Pointer to the file/directory name */
3997 const FILINFO* fno /* Pointer to the time stamp to be set */

4000  FRESULT res;

4003  DEF_NAMEBUF;

4006  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 1);
4007  if (res == FR_OK)
4008  {
4009  INIT_BUF(dj);
4010  res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
4011  FREE_BUF();
4012  if (_FS_RPATH && res == FR_OK && (dj.fn[NS] & NS_DOT))

4019  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
