4035 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4036 /* Rename File/Directory */
4037 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4038 
4039 MEMSPACE
4040 FRESULT f_rename (
4041 const TCHAR* path_old, /* Pointer to the object to be renamed */
4042 const TCHAR* path_new /* Pointer to the new name */
4043 )
4044 {
4045  FRESULT res;
4046  DIR djo, djn;
4047  BYTE buf[21], *dir;
4048  DWORD dw;
4049  DEF_NAMEBUF;
4050 
4051 /* Get logical drive number of the source object */
4052  res = find_volume(&djo.fs, &path_old, 1);
4053  if (res == FR_OK)
4054  {
4055  djn.fs = djo.fs;
4056  INIT_BUF(djo);
4057  res = follow_path(&djo, path_old); /* Check old object */
4058  if (_FS_RPATH && res == FR_OK && (djo.fn[NS] & NS_DOT))
4059  res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
4060 #if _FS_LOCK
4061  if (res == FR_OK) res = chk_lock(&djo, 2);
4062 #endif
4063  if (res == FR_OK) /* Old object is found */
4064  {
4065  if (!djo.dir) /* Is root dir? */
4066  {
4067  res = FR_NO_FILE;
4068  }
4069  else
4070  {
4071 /* Save the object information except name */
4072  mem_cpy(buf, djo.dir+DIR_Attr, 21);
4073  mem_cpy(&djn, &djo, sizeof (DIR));/* Duplicate the directory object */
4074  if (get_ldnumber(&path_new) >= 0) /* Snip drive number off and ignore it */
4075 /* and check if new object is exist */
4076  res = follow_path(&djn, path_new);
4077  else
4078  res = FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
4079  if (res == FR_OK) res = FR_EXIST; /* The new object name is already existing */
4080  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) /* Is it a valid path and no name collision? */
4081  {
4082 /* Start critical section that any interruption can cause a cross-link */
4083  res = dir_register(&djn); /* Register the new entry */
4084  if (res == FR_OK)
4085  {
4086  dir = djn.dir; /* Copy object information except name */
4087  mem_cpy(dir+13, buf+2, 19);
4088  dir[DIR_Attr] = buf[0] | AM_ARC;
4089  djo.fs->wflag = 1;
4090 /* Update .. entry in the directory if needed */
4091  if (djo.sclust != djn.sclust && (dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR))
4092  {
4093  dw = clust2sect(djo.fs, ld_clust(djo.fs, dir));
4094  if (!dw)
4095  {
4096  res = FR_INT_ERR;
4097  }
4098  else
4099  {
4100  res = move_window(djo.fs, dw);
4101 /* .. entry */
4102  dir = djo.fs->win+SZ_DIR;
4103  if (res == FR_OK && dir[1] == '.')
4104  {
4105  dw = (djo.fs->fs_type == FS_FAT32 && djn.sclust == djo.fs->dirbase) ? 0 : djn.sclust;
4106  st_clust(dir, dw);
4107  djo.fs->wflag = 1;
4108  }
4109  }
4110  }
4111  if (res == FR_OK)
4112  {
4113 /* Remove old entry */
4114  res = dir_remove(&djo);
4115  if (res == FR_OK)
4116  res = sync_fs(djo.fs);
4117  }
4118  }
4119 /* End critical section */
4120  }
4121  }
4122  }
4123  FREE_BUF();
4124  }
4125 
4126  LEAVE_FF(djo.fs, res);
4127 }
4128 #endif /* !_FS_READONLY */
4129 #endif /* _FS_MINIMIZE == 0 */
4130 #endif /* _FS_MINIMIZE <= 1 */
4131 #endif /* _FS_MINIMIZE <= 2 */
4132 
4133 #if _USE_LABEL
4134 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4135 /* Get volume label */
4136 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4137 
4138 MEMSPACE
4139 FRESULT f_getlabel (
4140 const TCHAR* path, /* Path name of the logical drive number */
4141 TCHAR* label, /* Pointer to a buffer to return the volume label */
4142 DWORD* vsn /* Pointer to a variable to return the volume serial number */
4143 )
4144 {
4145  FRESULT res;
4146  DIR dj;
4147  UINT i, j;
4148 
4149 /* Get logical drive number */
4150  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &path, 0);
4151 
4152 /* Get volume label */
4153  if (res == FR_OK && label)
4154  {
4155  dj.sclust = 0; /* Open root directory */
4156  res = dir_sdi(&dj, 0);
4157  if (res == FR_OK)
4158  {
4159  res = dir_read(&dj, 1); /* Get an entry with AM_VOL */
4160  if (res == FR_OK) /* A volume label is exist */
4161  {
4162 #if _USE_LFN && _LFN_UNICODE
4163  WCHAR w;
4164  i = j = 0;
4165  do
4166  {
4167  w = (i < 11) ? dj.dir[i++] : ' ';
4168  if (IsDBCS1(w) && i < 11 && IsDBCS2(dj.dir[i]))
4169  w = w << 8 | dj.dir[i++];
4170  label[j++] = ff_convert(w, 1);/* OEM -> Unicode */
4171  } while (j < 11);
4172 #else
4173  mem_cpy(label, dj.dir, 11);
4174 #endif
4175  j = 11;
4176  do
4177  {
4178  label[j] = 0;
4179  if (!j) break;
4180  } while (label[--j] == ' ');
4181  }
4182  if (res == FR_NO_FILE) /* No label, return nul string */
4183  {
4184  label[0] = 0;
4185  res = FR_OK;
4186  }
4187  }
4188  }
4189 
4190 /* Get volume serial number */
4191  if (res == FR_OK && vsn)
4192  {
4193  res = move_window(dj.fs, dj.fs->volbase);
4194  if (res == FR_OK)
4195  {
4196  i = dj.fs->fs_type == FS_FAT32 ? BS_VolID32 : BS_VolID;
4197  *vsn = LD_DWORD(&dj.fs->win[i]);
4198  }
4199  }
4200 
4201  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
4202 }
4203 
4204 
4205 #if !_FS_READONLY
4206 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4207 /* Set volume label */
4208 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4209 
4210 MEMSPACE
4211 FRESULT f_setlabel (
4212 const TCHAR* label /* Pointer to the volume label to set */
4213 )
4214 {
4215  FRESULT res;
4216  DIR dj;
4217  BYTE vn[11];
4218  UINT i, j, sl;
4219  WCHAR w;
4220  DWORD tm;
4221 
4222 /* Get logical drive number */
4223  res = find_volume(&dj.fs, &label, 1);
4224  if (res) LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
4225 
4226 /* Create a volume label in directory form */
4227  vn[0] = 0;
4228  for (sl = 0; label[sl]; sl++) ; /* Get name length */
4229  for ( ; sl && label[sl-1] == ' '; sl--) ; /* Remove trailing spaces */
4230  if (sl) /* Create volume label in directory form */
4231  {
4232  i = j = 0;
4233  do
4234  {
4235 #if _USE_LFN && _LFN_UNICODE
4236  w = ff_convert(ff_wtoupper(label[i++]), 0);
4237 #else
4238  w = (BYTE)label[i++];
4239  if (IsDBCS1(w))
4240  w = (j < 10 && i < sl && IsDBCS2(label[i])) ? w << 8 | (BYTE)label[i++] : 0;
4241 #if _USE_LFN
4242  w = ff_convert(ff_wtoupper(ff_convert(w, 1)), 0);
4243 #else
4244  if (IsLower(w)) w -= 0x20; /* To upper ASCII characters */
4245 #ifdef _EXCVT
4246  if (w >= 0x80) w = ExCvt[w - 0x80]; /* To upper extended characters (SBCS cfg) */
4247 #else
4248  if (!_DF1S && w >= 0x80) w = 0; /* Reject extended characters (ASCII cfg) */
4249 #endif
4250 #endif
4251 #endif
4252 /* Reject invalid characters for volume label */
4253  if (!w || chk_chr("\"*+,.:;<=>\?[]|\x7F", w) || j >= (UINT)((w >= 0x100) ? 10 : 11))
4254  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, FR_INVALID_NAME);
4255  if (w >= 0x100) vn[j++] = (BYTE)(w >> 8);
4256  vn[j++] = (BYTE)w;
4257  } while (i < sl);
4258  while (j < 11) vn[j++] = ' ';
4259  }
4260 
4261 /* Set volume label */
4262  dj.sclust = 0; /* Open root directory */
4263  res = dir_sdi(&dj, 0);
4264  if (res == FR_OK)
4265  {
4266  res = dir_read(&dj, 1); /* Get an entry with AM_VOL */
4267  if (res == FR_OK) /* A volume label is found */
4268  {
4269  if (vn[0])
4270  {
4271  mem_cpy(dj.dir, vn, 11); /* Change the volume label name */
4272  tm = get_fattime();
4273  ST_DWORD(dj.dir+DIR_WrtTime, tm);
4274  }
4275  else
4276  {
4277  dj.dir[0] = DDE; /* Remove the volume label */
4278  }
4279  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
4280  res = sync_fs(dj.fs);
4281  } /* No volume label is found or error */
4282  else
4283  {
4284  if (res == FR_NO_FILE)
4285  {
4286  res = FR_OK;
4287  if (vn[0]) /* Create volume label as new */
4288  {
4289  res = dir_alloc(&dj, 1); /* Allocate an entry for volume label */
4290  if (res == FR_OK)
4291  {
4292 /* Set volume label */
4293  mem_set(dj.dir, 0, SZ_DIR);
4294  mem_cpy(dj.dir, vn, 11);
4295  dj.dir[DIR_Attr] = AM_VOL;
4296  tm = get_fattime();
4297  ST_DWORD(dj.dir+DIR_WrtTime, tm);
4298  dj.fs->wflag = 1;
4299  res = sync_fs(dj.fs);
4300  }
4301  }
4302  }
4303  }
4304  }
4305 
4306  LEAVE_FF(dj.fs, res);
4307 }
4308 #endif /* !_FS_READONLY */
4309 #endif /* _USE_LABEL */
4310 
4311 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4312 /* Forward data to the stream directly (available on only tiny cfg) */
4313 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4314 #if _USE_FORWARD && _FS_TINY
4315 
4316 MEMSPACE
4317 FRESULT f_forward (
4318 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
4319 UINT (*func)(const BYTE*,UINT), /* Pointer to the streaming function */
4320 UINT btf, /* Number of bytes to forward */
4321 UINT* bf /* Pointer to number of bytes forwarded */
4322 )
4323 {
4324  FRESULT res;
4325  DWORD remain, clst, sect;
4326  UINT rcnt;
4327  BYTE csect;
4328 
4329  *bf = 0; /* Clear transfer byte counter */
4330 
4331  res = validate(fp); /* Check validity of the object */
4332  if (res != FR_OK) LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, res);
4333  if (fp->err) /* Check error */
4334  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, (FRESULT)fp->err);
4335  if (!(fp->flag & FA_READ)) /* Check access mode */
4336  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_DENIED);
4337 
4338  remain = fp->fsize - fp->fptr;
4339  if (btf > remain) btf = (UINT)remain; /* Truncate btf by remaining bytes */
4340 
4341  for ( ; btf && (*func)(0, 0); /* Repeat until all data transferred or stream becomes busy */
4342  fp->fptr += rcnt, *bf += rcnt, btf -= rcnt)
4343  {
4344 /* Sector offset in the cluster */
4345  csect = (BYTE)(fp->fptr / SS(fp->fs) & (fp->fs->csize - 1));
4346  if ((fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)) == 0) /* On the sector boundary? */
4347  {
4348  if (!csect) /* On the cluster boundary? */
4349  {
4350  clst = (fp->fptr == 0) ? /* On the top of the file? */
4351  fp->sclust : get_fat(fp->fs, fp->clust);
4352  if (clst <= 1) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4353  if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
4354  fp->clust = clst; /* Update current cluster */
4355  }
4356  }
4357  sect = clust2sect(fp->fs, fp->clust); /* Get current data sector */
4358  if (!sect) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4359  sect += csect;
4360  if (move_window(fp->fs, sect)) /* Move sector window */
4361  ABORT(fp->fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
4362  fp->dsect = sect;
4363 /* Forward data from sector window */
4364  rcnt = SS(fp->fs) - (WORD)(fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs));
4365  if (rcnt > btf) rcnt = btf;
4366  rcnt = (*func)(&fp->fs->win[(WORD)fp->fptr % SS(fp->fs)], rcnt);
4367  if (!rcnt) ABORT(fp->fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4368  }
4369 
4370  LEAVE_FF(fp->fs, FR_OK);
4371 }
4372 #endif /* _USE_FORWARD */
4373 
4374 #if _USE_MKFS && !_FS_READONLY
4375 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4376 /* Create File System on the Drive */
4377 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4378 #define N_ROOTDIR 512 /* Number of root directory entries for FAT12/16 */
4379 #define N_FATS 1 /* Number of FAT copies (1 or 2) */
4380 
4381 MEMSPACE
4382 FRESULT f_mkfs (
4383 const TCHAR* path, /* Logical drive number */
4384 BYTE sfd, /* Partitioning rule 0:FDISK, 1:SFD */
4385 UINT au /* Allocation unit [bytes] */
4386 )
4387 {
4388  static const WORD vst[] = { 1024, 512, 256, 128, 64, 32, 16, 8, 4, 2, 0};
4389  static const WORD cst[] = {32768, 16384, 8192, 4096, 2048, 16384, 8192, 4096, 2048, 1024, 512};
4390  int vol;
4391  BYTE fmt, md, sys, *tbl, pdrv, part;
4392  DWORD n_clst, vs, n, wsect;
4393  UINT i;
4394  DWORD b_vol, b_fat, b_dir, b_data; /* LBA */
4395  DWORD n_vol, n_rsv, n_fat, n_dir; /* Size */
4396  FATFS *fs;
4397  DSTATUS stat;
4398 
4399 /* Check mounted drive and clear work area */
4400  vol = get_ldnumber(&path);
4401  if (vol < 0) return FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
4402  if (sfd > 1) return FR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
4403  if (au & (au - 1)) return FR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
4404  fs = FatFs[vol];
4405  if (!fs) return FR_NOT_ENABLED;
4406  fs->fs_type = 0;
4407  pdrv = LD2PD(vol); /* Physical drive */
4408  part = LD2PT(vol); /* Partition (0:auto detect, 1-4:get from partition table)*/
4409 
4410 /* Get disk statics */
4411  stat = disk_initialize(pdrv);
4412  if (stat & STA_NOINIT) return FR_NOT_READY;
4413  if (stat & STA_PROTECT) return FR_WRITE_PROTECTED;
4414 #if _MAX_SS != _MIN_SS /* Get disk sector size */
4415  if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_SECTOR_SIZE, &SS(fs)) != RES_OK || SS(fs) > _MAX_SS || SS(fs) < _MIN_SS)
4416  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4417 #endif
4418  if (_MULTI_PARTITION && part)
4419  {
4420 /* Get partition information from partition table in the MBR */
4421  if (disk_read(pdrv, fs->win, 0, 1)) return FR_DISK_ERR;
4422  if (LD_WORD(fs->win+BS_55AA) != 0xAA55) return FR_MKFS_ABORTED;
4423  tbl = &fs->win[MBR_Table + (part - 1) * SZ_PTE];
4424  if (!tbl[4]) return FR_MKFS_ABORTED; /* No partition? */
4425  b_vol = LD_DWORD(tbl+8); /* Volume start sector */
4426  n_vol = LD_DWORD(tbl+12); /* Volume size */
4427  }
4428  else
4429  {
4430 /* Create a partition in this function */
4431  if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_SECTOR_COUNT, &n_vol) != RES_OK || n_vol < 128)
4432  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4433  b_vol = (sfd) ? 0 : 63; /* Volume start sector */
4434  n_vol -= b_vol; /* Volume size */
4435  }
4436 
4437  if (!au) /* AU auto selection */
4438  {
4439  vs = n_vol / (2000 / (SS(fs) / 512));
4440  for (i = 0; vs < vst[i]; i++) ;
4441  au = cst[i];
4442  }
4443  au /= SS(fs); /* Number of sectors per cluster */
4444  if (au == 0) au = 1;
4445  if (au > 128) au = 128;
4446 
4447 /* Pre-compute number of clusters and FAT sub-type */
4448  n_clst = n_vol / au;
4449  fmt = FS_FAT12;
4450  if (n_clst >= MIN_FAT16) fmt = FS_FAT16;
4451  if (n_clst >= MIN_FAT32) fmt = FS_FAT32;
4452 
4453 /* Determine offset and size of FAT structure */
4454  if (fmt == FS_FAT32)
4455  {
4456  n_fat = ((n_clst * 4) + 8 + SS(fs) - 1) / SS(fs);
4457  n_rsv = 32;
4458  n_dir = 0;
4459  }
4460  else
4461  {
4462  n_fat = (fmt == FS_FAT12) ? (n_clst * 3 + 1) / 2 + 3 : (n_clst * 2) + 4;
4463  n_fat = (n_fat + SS(fs) - 1) / SS(fs);
4464  n_rsv = 1;
4465  n_dir = (DWORD)N_ROOTDIR * SZ_DIR / SS(fs);
4466  }
4467  b_fat = b_vol + n_rsv; /* FAT area start sector */
4468  b_dir = b_fat + n_fat * N_FATS; /* Directory area start sector */
4469  b_data = b_dir + n_dir; /* Data area start sector */
4470 /* Too small volume */
4471  if (n_vol < b_data + au - b_vol) return FR_MKFS_ABORTED;
4472 
4473 /* Align data start sector to erase block boundary (for flash memory media) */
4474  if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_BLOCK_SIZE, &n) != RES_OK || !n || n > 32768) n = 1;
4475  n = (b_data + n - 1) & ~(n - 1); /* Next nearest erase block from current data start */
4476  n = (n - b_data) / N_FATS;
4477  if (fmt == FS_FAT32) /* FAT32: Move FAT offset */
4478  {
4479  n_rsv += n;
4480  b_fat += n;
4481  } /* FAT12/16: Expand FAT size */
4482  else
4483  {
4484  n_fat += n;
4485  }
4486 
4487 /* Determine number of clusters and final check of validity of the FAT sub-type */
4488  n_clst = (n_vol - n_rsv - n_fat * N_FATS - n_dir) / au;
4489  if ( (fmt == FS_FAT16 && n_clst < MIN_FAT16)
4490  || (fmt == FS_FAT32 && n_clst < MIN_FAT32))
4491  return FR_MKFS_ABORTED;
4492 
4493 /* Determine system ID in the partition table */
4494  if (fmt == FS_FAT32)
4495  {
4496  sys = 0x0C; /* FAT32X */
4497  }
4498  else
4499  {
4500  if (fmt == FS_FAT12 && n_vol < 0x10000)
4501  {
4502  sys = 0x01; /* FAT12(<65536) */
4503  }
4504  else
4505  {
4506  sys = (n_vol < 0x10000) ? 0x04 : 0x06;/* FAT16(<65536) : FAT12/16(>=65536) */
4507  }
4508  }
4509 
4510  if (_MULTI_PARTITION && part)
4511  {
4512 /* Update system ID in the partition table */
4513  tbl = &fs->win[MBR_Table + (part - 1) * SZ_PTE];
4514  tbl[4] = sys;
4515  if (disk_write(pdrv, fs->win, 0, 1)) /* Write it to teh MBR */
4516  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4517  md = 0xF8;
4518  }
4519  else
4520  {
4521  if (sfd) /* No partition table (SFD) */
4522  {
4523  md = 0xF0;
4524  } /* Create partition table (FDISK) */
4525  else
4526  {
4527  mem_set(fs->win, 0, SS(fs));
4528  tbl = fs->win+MBR_Table; /* Create partition table for single partition in the drive */
4529  tbl[1] = 1; /* Partition start head */
4530  tbl[2] = 1; /* Partition start sector */
4531  tbl[3] = 0; /* Partition start cylinder */
4532  tbl[4] = sys; /* System type */
4533  tbl[5] = 254; /* Partition end head */
4534  n = (b_vol + n_vol) / 63 / 255;
4535  tbl[6] = (BYTE)(n >> 2 | 63); /* Partition end sector */
4536  tbl[7] = (BYTE)n; /* End cylinder */
4537  ST_DWORD(tbl+8, 63); /* Partition start in LBA */
4538  ST_DWORD(tbl+12, n_vol); /* Partition size in LBA */
4539  ST_WORD(fs->win+BS_55AA, 0xAA55); /* MBR signature */
4540  if (disk_write(pdrv, fs->win, 0, 1)) /* Write it to the MBR */
4541  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4542  md = 0xF8;
4543  }
4544  }
4545 
4546 /* Create BPB in the VBR */
4547  tbl = fs->win; /* Clear sector */
4548  mem_set(tbl, 0, SS(fs));
4549  mem_cpy(tbl, "\xEB\xFE\x90" "MSDOS5.0", 11); /* Boot jump code, OEM name */
4550  i = SS(fs); /* Sector size */
4551  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_BytsPerSec, i);
4552  tbl[BPB_SecPerClus] = (BYTE)au; /* Sectors per cluster */
4553  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_RsvdSecCnt, n_rsv); /* Reserved sectors */
4554  tbl[BPB_NumFATs] = N_FATS; /* Number of FATs */
4555  i = (fmt == FS_FAT32) ? 0 : N_ROOTDIR; /* Number of root directory entries */
4556  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_RootEntCnt, i);
4557  if (n_vol < 0x10000) /* Number of total sectors */
4558  {
4559  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_TotSec16, n_vol);
4560  }
4561  else
4562  {
4563  ST_DWORD(tbl+BPB_TotSec32, n_vol);
4564  }
4565  tbl[BPB_Media] = md; /* Media descriptor */
4566  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_SecPerTrk, 63); /* Number of sectors per track */
4567  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_NumHeads, 255); /* Number of heads */
4568  ST_DWORD(tbl+BPB_HiddSec, b_vol); /* Hidden sectors */
4569  n = get_fattime(); /* Use current time as VSN */
4570  if (fmt == FS_FAT32)
4571  {
4572  ST_DWORD(tbl+BS_VolID32, n); /* VSN */
4573  ST_DWORD(tbl+BPB_FATSz32, n_fat); /* Number of sectors per FAT */
4574  ST_DWORD(tbl+BPB_RootClus, 2); /* Root directory start cluster (2) */
4575  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_FSInfo, 1); /* FSINFO record offset (VBR+1) */
4576  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_BkBootSec, 6); /* Backup boot record offset (VBR+6) */
4577  tbl[BS_DrvNum32] = 0x80; /* Drive number */
4578  tbl[BS_BootSig32] = 0x29; /* Extended boot signature */
4579 /* Volume label, FAT signature */
4580  mem_cpy(tbl+BS_VolLab32, "NO NAME " "FAT32 ", 19);
4581  }
4582  else
4583  {
4584  ST_DWORD(tbl+BS_VolID, n); /* VSN */
4585  ST_WORD(tbl+BPB_FATSz16, n_fat); /* Number of sectors per FAT */
4586  tbl[BS_DrvNum] = 0x80; /* Drive number */
4587  tbl[BS_BootSig] = 0x29; /* Extended boot signature */
4588 /* Volume label, FAT signature */
4589  mem_cpy(tbl+BS_VolLab, "NO NAME " "FAT ", 19);
4590  }
4591  ST_WORD(tbl+BS_55AA, 0xAA55); /* Signature (Offset is fixed here regardless of sector size) */
4592  if (disk_write(pdrv, tbl, b_vol, 1)) /* Write it to the VBR sector */
4593  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4594  if (fmt == FS_FAT32) /* Write backup VBR if needed (VBR+6) */
4595  disk_write(pdrv, tbl, b_vol + 6, 1);
4596 
4597 /* Initialize FAT area */
4598  wsect = b_fat;
4599  for (i = 0; i < N_FATS; i++) /* Initialize each FAT copy */
4600  {
4601  mem_set(tbl, 0, SS(fs)); /* 1st sector of the FAT */
4602  n = md; /* Media descriptor byte */
4603  if (fmt != FS_FAT32)
4604  {
4605  n |= (fmt == FS_FAT12) ? 0x00FFFF00 : 0xFFFFFF00;
4606  ST_DWORD(tbl+0, n); /* Reserve cluster #0-1 (FAT12/16) */
4607  }
4608  else
4609  {
4610  n |= 0xFFFFFF00;
4611  ST_DWORD(tbl+0, n); /* Reserve cluster #0-1 (FAT32) */
4612  ST_DWORD(tbl+4, 0xFFFFFFFF);
4613  ST_DWORD(tbl+8, 0x0FFFFFFF); /* Reserve cluster #2 for root directory */
4614  }
4615  if (disk_write(pdrv, tbl, wsect++, 1))
4616  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4617  mem_set(tbl, 0, SS(fs)); /* Fill following FAT entries with zero */
4618  for (n = 1; n < n_fat; n++) /* This loop may take a time on FAT32 volume due to many single sector writes */
4619  {
4620  if (disk_write(pdrv, tbl, wsect++, 1))
4621  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4622  }
4623  }
4624 
4625 /* Initialize root directory */
4626  i = (fmt == FS_FAT32) ? au : (UINT)n_dir;
4627  do
4628  {
4629  if (disk_write(pdrv, tbl, wsect++, 1))
4630  return FR_DISK_ERR;
4631 #ifdef ESP8266
4632  wdt_reset();
4633 #endif
4634  } while (--i);
4635 
4636 #if _USE_ERASE /* Erase data area if needed */
4637  {
4638  DWORD eb[2];
4639 
4640  eb[0] = wsect; eb[1] = wsect + (n_clst - ((fmt == FS_FAT32) ? 1 : 0)) * au - 1;
4641  disk_ioctl(pdrv, CTRL_ERASE_SECTOR, eb);
4642  }
4643 #endif
4644 
4645 /* Create FSINFO if needed */
4646  if (fmt == FS_FAT32)
4647  {
4648  ST_DWORD(tbl+FSI_LeadSig, 0x41615252);
4649  ST_DWORD(tbl+FSI_StrucSig, 0x61417272);
4650  ST_DWORD(tbl+FSI_Free_Count, n_clst - 1); /* Number of free clusters */
4651  ST_DWORD(tbl+FSI_Nxt_Free, 2); /* Last allocated cluster# */
4652  ST_WORD(tbl+BS_55AA, 0xAA55);
4653  disk_write(pdrv, tbl, b_vol + 1, 1); /* Write original (VBR+1) */
4654  disk_write(pdrv, tbl, b_vol + 7, 1); /* Write backup (VBR+7) */
4655  }
4656 
4657  return (disk_ioctl(pdrv, CTRL_SYNC, 0) == RES_OK) ? FR_OK : FR_DISK_ERR;
4658 }
4659 
4660 
4661 #if _MULTI_PARTITION
4662 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4663 /* Divide Physical Drive */
4664 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4665 
4666 MEMSPACE
4667 FRESULT f_fdisk (
4668 BYTE pdrv, /* Physical drive number */
4669 const DWORD szt[], /* Pointer to the size table for each partitions */
4670 void* work /* Pointer to the working buffer */
4671 )
4672 {
4673  UINT i, n, sz_cyl, tot_cyl, b_cyl, e_cyl, p_cyl;
4674  BYTE s_hd, e_hd, *p, *buf = (BYTE*)work;
4675  DSTATUS stat;
4676  DWORD sz_disk, sz_part, s_part;
4677 
4678  stat = disk_initialize(pdrv);
4679  if (stat & STA_NOINIT) return FR_NOT_READY;
4680  if (stat & STA_PROTECT) return FR_WRITE_PROTECTED;
4681  if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_SECTOR_COUNT, &sz_disk)) return FR_DISK_ERR;
4682 
4683 /* Determine CHS in the table regardless of the drive geometry */
4684  for (n = 16; n < 256 && sz_disk / n / 63 > 1024; n *= 2) ;
4685  if (n == 256) n--;
4686  e_hd = n - 1;
4687  sz_cyl = 63 * n;
4688  tot_cyl = sz_disk / sz_cyl;
4689 
4690 /* Create partition table */
4691  mem_set(buf, 0, _MAX_SS);
4692  p = buf + MBR_Table; b_cyl = 0;
4693  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++, p += SZ_PTE)
4694  {
4695  p_cyl = (szt[i] <= 100U) ? (DWORD)tot_cyl * szt[i] / 100 : szt[i] / sz_cyl;
4696  if (!p_cyl) continue;
4697  s_part = (DWORD)sz_cyl * b_cyl;
4698  sz_part = (DWORD)sz_cyl * p_cyl;
4699  if (i == 0) /* Exclude first track of cylinder 0 */
4700  {
4701  s_hd = 1;
4702  s_part += 63; sz_part -= 63;
4703  }
4704  else
4705  {
4706  s_hd = 0;
4707  }
4708  e_cyl = b_cyl + p_cyl - 1;
4709  if (e_cyl >= tot_cyl) return FR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
4710 
4711 /* Set partition table */
4712  p[1] = s_hd; /* Start head */
4713  p[2] = (BYTE)((b_cyl >> 2) + 1); /* Start sector */
4714  p[3] = (BYTE)b_cyl; /* Start cylinder */
4715  p[4] = 0x06; /* System type (temporary setting) */
4716  p[5] = e_hd; /* End head */
4717  p[6] = (BYTE)((e_cyl >> 2) + 63); /* End sector */
4718  p[7] = (BYTE)e_cyl; /* End cylinder */
4719  ST_DWORD(p + 8, s_part); /* Start sector in LBA */
4720  ST_DWORD(p + 12, sz_part); /* Partition size */
4721 
4722 /* Next partition */
4723  b_cyl += p_cyl;
4724  }
4725  ST_WORD(p, 0xAA55);
4726 
4727 /* Write it to the MBR */
4728  return (disk_write(pdrv, buf, 0, 1) || disk_ioctl(pdrv, CTRL_SYNC, 0)) ? FR_DISK_ERR : FR_OK;
4729 }
4730 #endif /* _MULTI_PARTITION */
4731 #endif /* _USE_MKFS && !_FS_READONLY */
4732 
4733 #if _USE_STRFUNC
4734 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4735 /* Get a string from the file */
4736 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4737 
4738 MEMSPACE
4739 TCHAR* f_gets (
4740 TCHAR* buff, /* Pointer to the string buffer to read */
4741 int len, /* Size of string buffer (characters) */
4742 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
4743 )
4744 {
4745  int n = 0;
4746  TCHAR c, *p = buff;
4747  BYTE s[2];
4748  UINT rc;
4749 
4750  while (n < len - 1) /* Read characters until buffer gets filled */
4751  {
4752 #if _USE_LFN && _LFN_UNICODE
4753 #if _STRF_ENCODE == 3 /* Read a character in UTF-8 */
4754  f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc);
4755  if (rc != 1) break;
4756  c = s[0];
4757  if (c >= 0x80)
4758  {
4759  if (c < 0xC0) continue; /* Skip stray trailer */
4760  if (c < 0xE0) /* Two-byte sequence */
4761  {
4762  f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc);
4763  if (rc != 1) break;
4764  c = (c & 0x1F) << 6 | (s[0] & 0x3F);
4765  if (c < 0x80) c = '?';
4766  }
4767  else
4768  {
4769  if (c < 0xF0) /* Three-byte sequence */
4770  {
4771  f_read(fp, s, 2, &rc);
4772  if (rc != 2) break;
4773  c = c << 12 | (s[0] & 0x3F) << 6 | (s[1] & 0x3F);
4774  if (c < 0x800) c = '?';
4775  } /* Reject four-byte sequence */
4776  else
4777  {
4778  c = '?';
4779  }
4780  }
4781  }
4782 #elif _STRF_ENCODE == 2 /* Read a character in UTF-16BE */
4783  f_read(fp, s, 2, &rc);
4784  if (rc != 2) break;
4785  c = s[1] + (s[0] << 8);
4786 #elif _STRF_ENCODE == 1 /* Read a character in UTF-16LE */
4787  f_read(fp, s, 2, &rc);
4788  if (rc != 2) break;
4789  c = s[0] + (s[1] << 8);
4790 #else /* Read a character in ANSI/OEM */
4791  f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc);
4792  if (rc != 1) break;
4793  c = s[0];
4794  if (IsDBCS1(c))
4795  {
4796  f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc);
4797  if (rc != 1) break;
4798  c = (c << 8) + s[0];
4799  }
4800  c = ff_convert(c, 1); /* OEM -> Unicode */
4801  if (!c) c = '?';
4802 #endif
4803 #else /* Read a character without conversion */
4804  f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc);
4805  if (rc != 1) break;
4806  c = s[0];
4807 #endif
4808 /* Strip '\r' */
4809  if (_USE_STRFUNC == 2 && c == '\r') continue;
4810  *p++ = c;
4811  n++;
4812  if (c == '\n') break; /* Break on EOL */
4813  }
4814  *p = 0;
4815  return n ? buff : 0; /* When no data read (eof or error), return with error. */
4816 }
4817 
4818 
4819 #if !_FS_READONLY
4820 #include <stdarg.h>
4821 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4822 /* Put a character to the file */
4823 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4824 
4825 typedef struct
4826 {
4827  FIL* fp;
4828  int idx, nchr;
4829  BYTE buf[64];
4830 } putbuff;
4831 
4832 MEMSPACE
4833 static
4834 void putc_bfd (
4835 putbuff* pb,
4836 TCHAR c
4837 )
4838 {
4839  UINT bw;
4840  int i;
4841 
4842  if (_USE_STRFUNC == 2 && c == '\n') /* LF -> CRLF conversion */
4843  putc_bfd(pb, '\r');
4844 
4845  i = pb->idx; /* Buffer write index (-1:error) */
4846  if (i < 0) return;
4847 
4848 #if _USE_LFN && _LFN_UNICODE
4849 #if _STRF_ENCODE == 3 /* Write a character in UTF-8 */
4850  if (c < 0x80) /* 7-bit */
4851  {
4852  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
4853  }
4854  else
4855  {
4856  if (c < 0x800) /* 11-bit */
4857  {
4858  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0xC0 | c >> 6);
4859  } /* 16-bit */
4860  else
4861  {
4862  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0xE0 | c >> 12);
4863  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0x80 | (c >> 6 & 0x3F));
4864  }
4865  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0x80 | (c & 0x3F));
4866  }
4867 #elif _STRF_ENCODE == 2 /* Write a character in UTF-16BE */
4868  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(c >> 8);
4869  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
4870 #elif _STRF_ENCODE == 1 /* Write a character in UTF-16LE */
4871  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
4872  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(c >> 8);
4873 #else /* Write a character in ANSI/OEM */
4874  c = ff_convert(c, 0); /* Unicode -> OEM */
4875  if (!c) c = '?';
4876  if (c >= 0x100)
4877  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(c >> 8);
4878  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
4879 #endif
4880 #else /* Write a character without conversion */
4881  pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
4882 #endif
4883 
4884  if (i >= (int)(sizeof pb->buf) - 3) /* Write buffered characters to the file */
4885  {
4886  f_write(pb->fp, pb->buf, (UINT)i, &bw);
4887  i = (bw == (UINT)i) ? 0 : -1;
4888  }
4889  pb->idx = i;
4890  pb->nchr++;
4891 }
4892 
4893 
4894 MEMSPACE
4895 int f_putc (
4896 TCHAR c, /* A character to be output */
4897 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
4898 )
4899 {
4900  putbuff pb;
4901  UINT nw;
4902 
4903  pb.fp = fp; /* Initialize output buffer */
4904  pb.nchr = pb.idx = 0;
4905 
4906  putc_bfd(&pb, c); /* Put a character */
4907 
4908  if ( pb.idx >= 0 /* Flush buffered characters to the file */
4909  && f_write(pb.fp, pb.buf, (UINT)pb.idx, &nw) == FR_OK
4910  && (UINT)pb.idx == nw) return pb.nchr;
4911  return EOF;
4912 }
4913 
4914 
4915 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4916 /* Put a string to the file */
4917 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4918 
4919 MEMSPACE
4920 int f_puts (
4921 const TCHAR* str, /* Pointer to the string to be output */
4922 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
4923 )
4924 {
4925  putbuff pb;
4926  UINT nw;
4927 
4928  pb.fp = fp; /* Initialize output buffer */
4929  pb.nchr = pb.idx = 0;
4930 
4931  while (*str) /* Put the string */
4932  putc_bfd(&pb, *str++);
4933 
4934  if ( pb.idx >= 0 /* Flush buffered characters to the file */
4935  && f_write(pb.fp, pb.buf, (UINT)pb.idx, &nw) == FR_OK
4936  && (UINT)pb.idx == nw) return pb.nchr;
4937  return EOF;
4938 }
4939 
4940 
4941 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4942 /* Put a formatted string to the file */
4943 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4944 
4945 MEMSPACE
4946 int f_printf (
4947 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
4948 const TCHAR* fmt, /* Pointer to the format string */
4949 ... /* Optional arguments... */
4950 )
4951 {
4952  va_list arp;
4953  BYTE f, r;
4954  UINT nw, i, j, w;
4955  DWORD v;
4956  TCHAR c, d, s[16], *p;
4957  putbuff pb;
4958 
4959  pb.fp = fp; /* Initialize output buffer */
4960  pb.nchr = pb.idx = 0;
4961 
4962  va_start(arp, fmt);
4963 
4964  for (;;)
4965  {
4966  c = *fmt++;
4967  if (c == 0) break; /* End of string */
4968  if (c != '%') /* Non escape character */
4969  {
4970  putc_bfd(&pb, c);
4971  continue;
4972  }
4973  w = f = 0;
4974  c = *fmt++;
4975  if (c == '0') /* Flag: '0' padding */
4976  {
4977  f = 1; c = *fmt++;
4978  }
4979  else
4980  {
4981  if (c == '-') /* Flag: left justified */
4982  {
4983  f = 2; c = *fmt++;
4984  }
4985  }
4986  while (IsDigit(c)) /* Precision */
4987  {
4988  w = w * 10 + c - '0';
4989  c = *fmt++;
4990  }
4991  if (c == 'l' || c == 'L') /* Prefix: Size is long int */
4992  {
4993  f |= 4; c = *fmt++;
4994  }
4995  if (!c) break;
4996  d = c;
4997  if (IsLower(d)) d -= 0x20;
4998  switch (d) /* Type is... */
4999  {
5000  case 'S' : /* String */
5001  p = va_arg(arp, TCHAR*);
5002  for (j = 0; p[j]; j++) ;
5003  if (!(f & 2))
5004  {
5005  while (j++ < w) putc_bfd(&pb, ' ');
5006  }
5007  while (*p) putc_bfd(&pb, *p++);
5008  while (j++ < w) putc_bfd(&pb, ' ');
5009  continue;
5010  case 'C' : /* Character */
5011  putc_bfd(&pb, (TCHAR)va_arg(arp, int)); continue;
5012  case 'B' : /* Binary */
5013  r = 2; break;
5014  case 'O' : /* Octal */
5015  r = 8; break;
5016  case 'D' : /* Signed decimal */
5017  case 'U' : /* Unsigned decimal */
5018  r = 10; break;
5019  case 'X' : /* Hexdecimal */
5020  r = 16; break;
5021  default: /* Unknown type (pass-through) */
5022  putc_bfd(&pb, c); continue;
5023  }
5024 
5025 /* Get an argument and put it in numeral */
5026  v = (f & 4) ? (DWORD)va_arg(arp, long) : ((d == 'D') ? (DWORD)(long)va_arg(arp, int) : (DWORD)va_arg(arp, unsigned int));
5027  if (d == 'D' && (v & 0x80000000))
5028  {
5029  v = 0 - v;
5030  f |= 8;
5031  }
5032  i = 0;
5033  do
5034  {
5035  d = (TCHAR)(v % r); v /= r;
5036  if (d > 9) d += (c == 'x') ? 0x27 : 0x07;
5037  s[i++] = d + '0';
5038  } while (v && i < sizeof s / sizeof s[0]);
5039  if (f & 8) s[i++] = '-';
5040  j = i; d = (f & 1) ? '0' : ' ';
5041  while (!(f & 2) && j++ < w) putc_bfd(&pb, d);
5042  do putc_bfd(&pb, s[--i]); while (i);
5043  while (j++ < w) putc_bfd(&pb, d);
5044  }
5045 
5046  va_end(arp);
5047 
5048  if ( pb.idx >= 0 /* Flush buffered characters to the file */
5049  && f_write(pb.fp, pb.buf, (UINT)pb.idx, &nw) == FR_OK
5050  && (UINT)pb.idx == nw) return pb.nchr;
5051  return EOF;
5052 }
5053 #endif /* !_FS_READONLY */
5054 #endif /* _USE_STRFUNC */
